    • Method Detail

      • findKNN

        public abstract Cell findKNN(java.lang.String targetKey,
                             Point targetPoint,
                             int neighbours)
        findKNN finds the k nearest neighbours. This is an abstract class that is instantiated by the seperate Maths.kNN algorithms.
        Parameters:
        targetKey - The key of the value to be found.
        targetPoint - The point that the value is to be found for.
        neighbours - The number of neighbours to use
        Returns:
        A DataModel.Cell containing the information claculated value(s).

      • findValue

        public Cell findValue(java.util.ArrayList<kNN.Tuple<java.lang.Float,Cell>> closestKNeighbours,
                      java.lang.String targetKey)
        findValue finds the target value given the k nearest neighbours, and the target key.
        Parameters:
        closestKNeighbours - An ArrayList of Tuples containing the distance and corresponding DataModel.Cell of each of the k nearest neighbours.
        targetKey - The key of the value to be found
        Returns:
        A cell containing the calculated value(s)

      • calculateCompositeCell

        public CellComposite calculateCompositeCell(java.util.ArrayList<kNN.Tuple<java.lang.Float,Cell>> closestKNeighbours,
                                            java.lang.String targetKey)
        calculateCompositeCell calculates the Maths.kNN value if the target key corresponds to a DataModel.CellComposite
        Parameters:
        closestKNeighbours - An ArrayList of Tuples containing the distance and corresponding DataModel.Cell of each of the k nearest neighbours.
        targetKey - The key of the value to be found
        Returns:
        A DataModel.CellComposite containing the calculated value(s)

      • calculateSimpleCell

        public Cell calculateSimpleCell(java.util.ArrayList<kNN.Tuple<java.lang.Float,Cell>> closestKNeighbours,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                java.lang.String targetKey)
        calculateSimpleCell calculates the Maths.kNN value if the target key corresponds to a DataModel.CellSimple. This is called by calculateCompositeCell when it needs to calculate DataModel.CellSimple values. For numeric values, this funcitons returns the average as the value. For String values, this function returnseither the most common String among the nearest neighbours, or in the case of a tie, the closest String of the nighbours involved. For example, if every String appears once, this function will return the String of the nearest neighbour.
        Parameters:
        closestKNeighbours - An ArrayList of Tuples containing the distance and corresponding DataModel.Cell of each of the k nearest neighbours.
        targetKey - The key of the value to be found
        Returns:
        A DataModel.CellSimple containing the calculated value(s)
